value.title: AI Visionary, Leader And 21st Century Maverick Sol Rashidi Of Estée Lauder
value.excerpt: My Conversation with one of the most influential, inspirational and brilliant minds. As part of my Series of The 9 Inspirational Women Leaders In AI Shaping The 21st Century, I was honored to converse with Sol Rashidi.

value.title: NSW government AI projects face ethics assessment under new assurance framework
value.excerpt: The mandated AI Assurance Framework will help agencies establish clear governance and accountability measures when using AI.

value.title: Synopsys Launches Disruptive Cloud-Based SaaS Solution To Accelerate And Democratize Chip Design
value.excerpt: In a move that could have broad-reaching implications for chip design and the Electronic Design Automation industry, Synopsys has launched a new cloud-based SaaS solution, dubbed Synopsys Cloud, which makes its cutting-edge design a tools available to a diverse spectrum of potential customers.

value.title: CEA-Leta finds inspiration for edge AI in insect’s nervous systems
value.excerpt: Scientist Elisa Vianello has received a grant to use novel nanoscale memory technologies that mimic the biological mechanisms from insects to create silicon-based, energy-efficient nanoscale systems for edge AI.

value.title: Spirit Uses Facial Recognition at Atlanta, Ga., Airport
value.excerpt: Spirit Airlines has begun using facial-scanning technology at Atlanta's Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport to speed up boarding for passengers who, the company claims, can opt out of the scan.

value.title: Meta AI’s open-source system attempts to right gender bias in Wikipedia biographies
value.excerpt: Meta AI's open-sourced the model and corresponding dataset relates to not only women, but women in science and those located in Asia and Africa.

value.title: How Nvidia is harnessing AI to improve predictive maintenance

value.title: Battery-free MakeCode empowers kids to code sustainably

value.title: Betting on AI, VCs back startups as the tech world booms
value.excerpt: Businesses seeking new information systems have typically had two choices — they could purchase one from an external vendor or build a new system using in-house developers. Today, there is a third alternative — low-code/no-code applications powered by AI.

value.title: Waymo Expands Self-Driving Car Trials to San Francisco
value.excerpt: Way-mo, way-mo, off to work they go. Waymo employees in San Francisco will be able to catch a ride to work from its fleet of self-driving, all-electric Jaguar I-PACE cars.
